channel.title: New Scar Divi
channel.description: alright i had originally gone out and got what i thought was the newest version but it ends up there's a 3.02 out or something. So i go ahead and download it, but it didn't download the new srl for me, as the first divi did. So i went out to villu-reborn, and i can't log in for some reason, i guess i have to be added to the admins whitelist or w\e. so im not going to bother with that i have no idea how to. so could somebody help me out?

item.title: New Scar Divi
item.dc:creator: @gokon gokon
item.description:
@gokon wrote:

Ahem what about 3.2, dudeofthed?

Read full topic

item.title: New Scar Divi
item.dc:creator: @dudeofthed dudeofthed
item.description:
@dudeofthed wrote:

[quote=“gokon, post:5, topic:81466”][quote author=dudeofthed link=topic=119755.msg1176475#msg1176475 date=1176911504]

well when i went to run the script it acts as if it doesn’t have srl. gives me errors saying it could not find the srl extension. I mean i got the srl on 3.0 but not the new version

Then just use 3.0, there is no real difference really. All the newer version does (As so i have heard) is remove the auto download feature for SRL.
[/quote]
or he could just click the file button in the new SCAR and click download SRL.[/quote]
3.1 removed the “Yes” button to download SRL. That was what i was saying, “Auto download feature”.

Read full topic
